replies.body:
So here is what you need to understand.

1. the system will only give you punishment notifications if the game you reported him was the game that got him banned.

2. the system punishes based on severity x consistency. 

3. Due to privacy laws, his behavior / punishment is literally none of your business.

So if the dude had a one off game, your encounter with him will not get him punished. But if he was consistently toxic, then the system will pick him up.

Even if he got chat restricted the next game, you'll never know.
Naming&shaming? You're trying to report someone breaking the rules BY BREAKING THE RULES yourself. What an irony.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules

> Naming and Shaming
> 
> If you see or hear about another person breaking the rules, in-game or on Boards, regardless of evidence, please send a ticket in to us at https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
> Moderators will look for the following:
> Personal attacks
> Posts that accuse others of causing a negative in-game experience
> Posts targeted at witch-hunting / naming and shaming
> Posts accusing others of malicious activity
> Posts that accuse others of cheating or using illegal services
> Posts accusing others of trolling on the Boards
